summary:
PLEASE NOTE THAT I TOOK THE SCREENSHOTS WITH ENB SERIES!
IN YOUR GAME THE GRAPHICS AND TEXTURES WILL LOOK DIFFERENT!


How to craft it:

1 Flawless Diamond
1 Magelight Staff
2 Firewood
2 Diamonds

Craft it on the Misc Section of ANY forge!

Staff Spell:
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE NOTE THAT I TOOK THE SCREENSHOTS WITH ENB SERIES!
IN YOUR GAME THE GRAPHICS AND TEXTURES WILL LOOK DIFFERENT!


How to craft it:

1 Flawless Diamond
1 Magelight Staff
2 Firewood
2 Diamonds

Craft it on the Misc Section of ANY forge!

Staff Spell:

Magelight


It is a good alternative to the normal Skyrim magelight staff (if you get bored of it).


Got suggestions?

Leave a comment!
author: Quechus13
